mapper.insert: insert into account_info (TAAccountID, Name, Sex, Nationality, Vocation, Address, TelNo, CertificateType, CertificateNo, CertValidDate, TransactionAccountID, DistributorCode, BranchCode, AccountStatus, TACode, CustomerNo) values (#{TAAccountID}, #{Name}, #{Sex}, #{Nationality}, #{Vocation}, #{Address}, #{TelNo}, #{CertificateType}, #{CertificateNo}, #{CertValidDate}, #{TransactionAccountID}, #{DistributorCode}, #{BranchCode}, #{AccountStatus}, #{TACode}, #{CustomerNo})
mapper.update: update account_info set Name = #{Name}, Sex = #{Sex}, Nationality = #{Nationality}, Vocation = #{Vocation}, Address = #{Address}, TelNo = #{TelNo}, CertificateType = #{CertificateType}, CertificateNo = #{CertificateNo}, CertValidDate = #{CertValidDate}, TransactionAccountID = #{TransactionAccountID}, DistributorCode = #{DistributorCode}, BranchCode = #{BranchCode}, AccountStatus = #{AccountStatus}, TACode = #{TACode}, CustomerNo = #{CustomerNo} where TAAccountID = #{TAAccountID}
